often when most <lb n="c57-0160_main_31"/>miserable I sunk to repose & my dreams <lb n="c57-0160_main_32"/><del rend="strikethrough">lu</del> lulled <add place="sublinear"><metamark>^</metamark></add><add place="superlinear">me</add> even to rapture – The spirit <lb n="c57-0160_main_33"/>that guarded me had surely provided <lb n="c57-0160_main_34"/>these moments or rather hours of happi<lb n="c57-0160_main_35"/>ness that I might retain strength to</zone> </surface>
